NewYear2026-final:
Witness
…Collected.
Midnight passed.
The New Year ended long ago.
These boxes are all that remains.
Take one.
In it is silence.
It will help you hear when darkness comes closer.
Go.

itemdesc-memorialscarf2026: A scarf with embroidery you don't want to show. Warm like a promise no one kept.
itemdesc-newyear2026:memorialscarf2026: A scarf with embroidery you don't want to show. Warm like a promise no one kept.
dialogue-witness-intro: The Witness is silent. Then he looks at you as if counting seconds to midnight.
